metadata.name: MOON CHILD by Lorenza Liguori
metadata.description:
The work is inspired by the 1984 film The Never Ending Story. In the movie, based on Michael Ende's novel, the malevolent force The Nothing is destroying the kingdom of Fantàsia and is killing the Childlike Empress. The hero Atreyu, called to defeat The Nothing, discovers from the oracle that the only way to save the kingdom and the empress is to give her a new name. But only a human being who still believes in dreams can provide a new name. The new name will be MOON CHILD.

Lorenza Liguori: [Twitter](https://twitter.com/LiguoriLorenza) • [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/lorenza.liguori/)
